name: Slime Run (SilentWispGames)
description:
I started this game when I first started to learn game development about a year ago. I've finally completed it after working each day for an hour or two. My first ever game. So proud.

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Songs I used were:

 1) 

The Soul-Crushing Monotony Of Isolation (Instrumental Mix) by Punch Deck | https://soundcloud.com/punch-deck

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
